scripts.build-js: yarn run build-framework && yarn run build-app
scripts.run:darwin:amd64: yarn pre-build && set GOARCH=amd64 && yarn run-darwin-linux
scripts.build:linux:amd64: yarn pre-build && set GOARCH=amd64 && yarn build-darwin-linux
scripts.build:linux:386: yarn pre-build && set GOARCH=386 && set CGO_ENABLED=1 && yarn build-darwin-linux
scripts.build:darwin:amd64: yarn pre-build && set GOARCH=amd64 && yarn build-darwin-linux
scripts.build:darwin:386: yarn pre-build && set GOARCH=386 && set CGO_ENABLED=1 && yarn build-darwin-linux
scripts.pre-build: yarn run build-framework && yarn run build-app && vgo generate -tags js
scripts.build-windows: yarn pre-build && vgo build -ldflags "-H windowsgui -X main.VERSION=%VERSION%" -v -tags js
scripts.version:darwin:amd64: GOARCH=amd64 CGO_ENABLED=1 GOOS=darwin node scripts/build.js build-darwin-linux
scripts.version:windows:amd64: set GOARCH=amd64&& set CGO_ENABLED=1&& set GOOS=windows&& node scripts/build.js build-windows
scripts.version:windows:386: set GOARCH=386&& set CGO_ENABLED=1&& set GOOS=windows&& node scripts/build.js build-windows
